channel.title: PerfectionX -Finally back to finish it- -opened- *Apply Today*
channel.description:
[ul][center][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/fbw4s7.png[/img][/center] [center]
server Name: PerfectionX base: Project instanity Server Status: Still in devlopment Website: None yet Release Date: Dec 22nd (depending on dev)
[/center] ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Hello everyone, my name is [b]Joshua[/b] im a old friend of prototypes, we actually shut down this server a while ago.. but prototype went on to do his own server 3c-nation so im going to start this project back up from scratch I would like to bring forward to the community a new RSPS, [b]PerfectionX[/b]. As you can tell by the title we are aiming for this server to be perfect. Originally [b]PerfectionX[/b], was not going to be released. This was as it was a project for me to learn from, but it is turning and 'perfectly'. Hopefully, the full server would be released a few days before Christmas. We are going to make it Christmas related for December but then we are going to start on the hard stuff.
[b] By hard stuff I mean:[/b] Summoning construction Dungeenering hunter full screen all bosses
-----------------------------------[b]Media[/b]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Not alot of pics seeming how this is new and all but ill upload more as the day goes on [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2meee4l.png[/img] [hr] [b]Here are some things about the server:[/b]
[b]What base have used for PerfectionX?[/b] Project Insanity [b]What is PerfectionX?[/b] It's the perfect RSPS. [b]What would we like to have in the server in the short term?[/b] GWD,other dungeons, all bosses, claws,vls,stat, other weps,custom Armour, clan wars,jad,pits and other mini-games,perfection points. [b]What do we want to achieve from the server?[/b] Personally I would like to achieve many types of accomplishments. I would like to have the following: Perfect economy; fully working summoning; fully working construction; fully working dungeenering(first ever); all quests from the real RS. all the minigames all the new bosses
[hr] At the moment what we have in-terms of skills(Red= not started,Orange= on the way, Green= finished) : Attack Magic theiving Smitting Dungeenering Strength Rune crafting crafting Fishing Construction Defense Hit points fleching Fire-making summoning Range Agillity slayer WoodCutting Prayer minning Farming Herblore [hr] [b]Ok what we are looking for is:[/b] server Coders Web designer Webclient maker client coders beta testers [hr] [b]Terms:[/b] If your would like to apply please make sure that you are dedicated, we do not want people that will leave after a day. Also make sure that you are kind of mature and you do not fight with other people, we do not want fights between staff members. All developers will have a custom green crown just like the administrates one but in green.
Name: Timezone: Job wanted: Any past experience? Why you chose PerfectionX? By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: Msn:
[hr] [b]I will post your application status HERE please check here:[/b] [hr]
[b]Positions At the moment:[/b] Owner: Joshua Hoster:OPEN Website designer:Chris gfx designer:Eric and KrackKid head coder:joshua coder:OPEN coder:OPEN coder:OPEN Advertisement:OPEN
[hr] [b]If you like our server or want to support us then use this please:[/b] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/nx6trq.png[/img] [hr] Thank you to our old gfx designer krack kid for these gfx. -we are taking in suggestions on weather we keep PI as our base or have another one :) [hr] [b]Supporters:[/b] *[size=8pt]to get in this list just say i support or use our support banner[/size] [hr][/ul]

item.title: PerfectionX -Finally back to finish it- -opened- *Apply Today*
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh pkerjosh
item.description:
@pkerjosh wrote:

Thanks every bit of support helps man im having a problem tho my laptop wont turn on ffs so i got to get it fixed so im gonna have to find a way around this shit haha

Question: Why do you have positions as "junior, regular, and head programmers"?

Tyb97 i just got it done like that cause i feel that its not fair to limit the coders due to there experience so if you can code a little bit then you can go in as junior coder i just have a way of viewing and hope that by doing it this way we can help grow more mature and skillful coders

Read full topic

Name:tyler Timezone:GMT-0800 (Pacific Standard Time) Job wanted:hosting Any past experience? i hosted my own server for a while Why you chose PerfectionX? im looking for a good server By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned:yes Msn:bmxrocks9782@hotmail.com

Accepted add me gipsey 1995@hotmail.com

Name: Chris Timezone: East Coast United States Job wanted: Web Designer Any past experience? A couple years of HTML and CSS developement, still learning PHP but have some experience. I have made multiple websites but they are no longer online. I can reupload them if you want some examples. Why you chose PerfectionX? I am looking for a good developement team that is not going to drop out fast like majority of them. By stating yes you agree to the terms and mentioned: Yes (And I actually read it) Msn: PM me for it.
accepted add me gipsey1995@hotmail.com

and thanks for all of the support guys means alot
